scripts.setup: docker compose run --rm composer install && docker compose up -d mysql && docker compose up -d php && docker compose up -d server && docker compose up -d vue && npm run migrate
scripts.migrate: docker compose exec php php artisan migrate
scripts.laravel:key: docker compose exec php php artisan key:generate
scripts.laravel:cache: docker compose exec php php artisan config:cache
scripts.start: docker compose up -d server && docker compose up -d vue
